  • All Classes

Package petri.api

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actor
    The base class for all things that both move and paint.
    Actors
    Container for all Actors.
    AnimatedImage
    A GameImage that divide up the given image into frames.
    AnimatedImageActor
    An Actor that will change frames from a AnimatedImage while moving to display an animation.
    Button
    Graphic representing a clickable area for game control.
    CollisionThread
    Calculates the collisions of one actor in relation to the group of actors.
    ConnectionListener
    Listens for network input on a seperate thread to enable faster run speeds in the game.
    DualResolutionGameImage
    Holds both a High and Low res Image for use in drawing and collision detection, respectively.
    GameApplet
    The class that takes Applet input and distributes it to GameEngine and current GameMode.
    GameEngine
    Handles all the game logic and painting based on the current game mode.
    GameImage
    The base class for all Images used in the game.
    GameInitializer
    Starts the game and displays the Applet.
    GameMode
    Base class that contains all of the necessary methods for GameModes.
    HostThread
    A seperate thread that listens for a connection without blocking the rest of the game.
    ImageActor
    An Actor that uses an Image when drawing itself.
    NetworkAdapter
    Provides convenience method for connecting to a specified IP address and port, or hosting on the IP on a given port.
    Particle
    A non-colliding Actor that is used for particle effects.
    ParticleEngine
    Controls the logic behind the creation of differing Particle explosions.
    PolygonActor
    A variant of Actor that draws itself with a Polygon.
    SoundPlayer
    A controller that allows the user to easily load and manage sounds in queues.
